sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by data model version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not fail or overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Ghanshyam, Sagar Bele
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dms_opdunit (unit_id INTEGER NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, unit_no INTEGER, opd_concept_id INTEGER, opd_day VARCHAR(255), start_time VARCHAR(10), end_time VARCHAR(10), active_date DATETIME, deactive_date DATETIME, creator INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY (unit_id));
